Text.Page:
I saw something on a recon mission just a bit ago...treasure! Lots of it!

Guards? Well...um, yeah. Just one important guard: {@LinkCreature:11#5001#Belkarius}.

Kill him, and the treasure is ours!

Well, I'm sure you grabbed some treasure, right? Good.

You also made it a lot easier for me to do recon in that chamber.
